sqlMap.select: SELECT bt.TYPE_ID, bt.TYPE_NAME, bt.CREATE_TIME, bt.TYPE_STATE, bt.TYPE_MEMO, DATE_FORMAT(bt.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME_STR FROM T_BLOG_TYPE bt WHERE bt.TYPE_STATE = '0' ORDER BY bt.TYPE_ID ASC, bt.CREATE_TIME ASC
SELECT bt.TYPE_ID, bt.TYPE_NAME, bt.CREATE_TIME, bt.TYPE_STATE, bt.TYPE_MEMO, DATE_FORMAT(bt.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME_STR FROM T_BLOG_TYPE bt WHERE bt.TYPE_ID = #typeId#
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(TYPE_ID+1), 0) AS typeId FROM T_BLOG_TYPE
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_BLOG_TYPE(TYPE_ID, TYPE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, TYPE_STATE, TYPE_MEMO) VALUES(#typeId#, #typeName#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #typeState#, #typeMemo#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_BLOG_TYPE SET TYPE_NAME = #typeName#, TYPE_MEMO = #typeMemo# WHERE TYPE_ID = #typeId#
